    ca.utoronto.utm.paint  

    • Uses of Shape in ca.utoronto.utm.paint

      Subclasses of Shape in ca.utoronto.utm.paint 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Circle
      This class makes a circle shape.
      class  Polygon
      Polygon, subclass of Shape A Polygon object that is created by several interconnected Points.
      class  Rectangle
      This is the Rectangle class that extends the shape.
      class  Square
      A Square of type Shape.
      class  Squiggle
      Squiggle, subclass of Shape An object made up of connected dots.
